name: note-taker
description: * This is an application called [***Note Taker***](https://note-taker-v3000-27717ed21972.herokuapp.com/) that can be used to write and save notes. * This application will use an [*Express.js*](https://expressjs.com/) back end and will save and retrieve note data from a *JSON* file. * This application is also deployed to [*Heroku*](https://www.heorku.com) as [Note-Taker-v3000](https://note-taker-v3000-27717ed21972.herokuapp.com/)
